want to make?
Boulder Mountain
Enormous Tree
Glacier

<CANCEL_SELECT>
Nothing
There's a festival today, so the shop is closed.
The shop is closed on this day of the week.

It's outside of business hours. This shop is
closed.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hi! Welcome to the Carpenter's Shop! Take your
time and have a look around.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hi! Welcome to the Carpenter's Shop! Take your
time and have a look around.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To make the <MOJI0>, you'll need:
<BLUE><MOJI1> pieces of <ITEMNAME0></BLUE>

<BLUE><MOJI2> pieces of <ITEMNAME1></BLUE>

To make the <MOJI0>, you'll need:
<BLUE><MOJI1> pieces of <ITEMNAME0></BLUE>
<BLUE><MOJI2> pieces of <ITEMNAME1></BLUE>
<PAGE>

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Altogether, that comes to <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>G. Okay?
Yes

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Uh-oh. It looks like you don't have all the
materials you'll need. Come on back once you've
gotten everything, okay?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Uh-oh. It looks like you don't have enough
money to afford it. Come on back once you've
saved up enough, okay?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Uh-oh. It looks like you don't have enough
money or all the materials you'll need. Come on
back once you've gotten it all together, okay?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So you're adding a nice <MOJI0> to the
Safari, then? I'll go and call Gunther. You wait
out front, okay?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want materials, right? We've got nothing but
the best here. What are you looking for?
How many do you want?
You don't have enough money!
There's no space in your bag!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Come on back soon, okay?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yes! To renovate your house, you'll need:
<BLUE>15 Small Lumber</BLUE> and <BLUE>15 Small Stones</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Once you've got them all, come on by and see
us. Gunther'll give you a hand with the
renovations.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yes! To renovate your house, you'll need:
<BLUE>15 Small Lumber</BLUE> and <BLUE>15 Small Stones</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Once you've got them all, come on by and see
us. Gunther'll give you a hand with the
renovations.
<PAGE>
But the weather had better be nice! I don't want
anybody getting sick or hurt trying to work out
in the rain!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! Looks like you've got what you need to
renovate your house. But the weather stinks
today. Could you come back when it's nicer?
<PAGE>
I don't want anybody getting sick or hurt trying
to work out in the rain.
